footer.bottom: This is the bottom of the page

user.noBio: This user has not written anything.

username.alphanumeric: Usernames cannot contain special characters or spaces.
username.disallowed: This username isn't allowed to be used.

password.length: Password must be at least 10 characters.

enable2FA.heading: 2fa provides much stronger security for your account during login, by requiring an additional time-sensitive code.
enable2FA.scan: Scan the following QR Code in a 2FA authentication app (eg. Authy).
enable2FA.finish: To finish enabling 2FA, you must enter a valid 2fa token.

changeEmail.heading: A confirmation email will be sent to the new address. Your email will only be changed if you confirm the new one.
changeEmail.submitHeading: A confirmation link has been sent to the new address. Your email will only get changed once you confirm it.

changeEmailSuccess.title: Email Changed Successfully
changeEmailSuccess.label: Your email has been changed to:

changeUsername.heading: Your old username will become available after the change.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.heading: Enter your email to receive a password reset link.
forgotPassword.submitHeading: A password reset link was sent if this account exists.

verifyEmail.title: Verify Email
verifyEmail.heading: You must verify your email address in order to use your account. If you need to change your email and/or resend the verification link, you can do so below.
verifyEmail.submitHeading: Verification email resent. Check your email.

verifyEmailSuccess.title: Email Verified
verifyEmailSuccess.heading: Thank you, your email address has been verified! You should be able to use your account now.

login.signupText: Don't have an account? Sign up.
login.rateLimit: Too many login attempts, try again later.

signup.title: Sign Up
signup.submitHeading: Your account has been created. You should have received a confirmation link in your email. Please verify your email and login again.
signup.error: Bad username, password, email, or captcha.
signup.rateLimit: Too many accounts created, try again later.
signup.banned: This IP is associated with a banned account.
signup.varietyReq: -At least three of the following: lowercase letters, uppercase letters, numbers, and special symbols

loginHistory.heading: If you don't recognize the activity, logout of all other sessions and change your password!

premiumSuccess.title: Account Upgraded!
premiumSuccess.thankYou: Thank you for purchasing premium! Your account has been upgraded and you can now access all of the premium features.
premiumSuccess.lastUntil: Your premium membership will last until

tag.bannedArtist: You may not upload artwork from this artist.

contact.heading: This is a contact form for general inquiries. If you would like to remove your work, please fill out our

copyrightRemoval.title: Copyright Removal
copyrightRemoval.heading: If your work is on Moepictures then it means that we love your work, but we are sorry if you are unhappy with your works appearing on our site. You may fill out this form to request the removal of your content.
copyrightRemoval.emailPref: If you prefer, you may also write an email containing all of this info to
copyrightRemoval.artistTagHeading: Please provide the exact name of your artist tag on Moepictures.
copyrightRemoval.socialMediaHeading: Please provide your social media links (eg. Twitter, Pixiv). It should be possible to find the works on your profile.
copyrightRemoval.removeSpecified: Remove all of the specified links
copyrightRemoval.removeAll: Remove all of my associated content
copyrightRemoval.artistTagPageHeading: Please provide the link to your artist tag page.
copyrightRemoval.postLinkHeading: Please provide all the post links that you want removed.
copyrightRemoval.proofHeading: Please provide proof that you are the artist in question. These are a couple acceptable forms of proof:
copyrightRemoval.emailProof: ⇾ If your email is publicly listed on your accounts, contact us using that email. Post the link of where your email is listed.
copyrightRemoval.postProof: ⇾ Post somewhere on your profile or in one of your posts "Remove me from Moepictures" and post the link to it.
copyrightRemoval.sourceProof: ⇾ Attach a source file (.psd, .clip) to one of your works which isn't released publicly.
copyrightRemoval.verifyCopyright: I am the copyright owner of the content linked above or am authorized to act on the behalf of the copyright owner. I verify that all of provided information is accurate.
copyrightRemoval.proofReq: Providing a proof attachment or links is required.
copyrightRemoval.confirmReq: You must confirm that you are the copyright owner.
copyrightRemoval.error: There was an error sending the message.

upload.submitHeadingApproval: Your post was submitted and will appear on the site if approved.
upload.multipleHeading: If there are multiple images, select the rightmost tag that fits.
upload.childHeading: If this is a child post, enter the parent post ID:
upload.artistExists: If the artist tag does not yet exist, please upload an artist image.
upload.characterExists: If the character tag does not yet exist, please upload a character image.
upload.seriesExists: If the series tag does not yet exist, please upload a series image.
upload.enterTags: Enter dashed tags separated by spaces. Tags can describe any of the images. If the tag doesn't exist, you will be promted to create it. If you need help with tags, read the
upload.spaceSeparation: Tags should be separated with a space.
upload.error: Failed to submit. You might be missing required fields.
upload.supportedFiletypes: Supported file types: png, jpg, webp, avif, gif, mp4, webm, mp3, wav, glb, fbx, obj, zip.
upload.supportedFiletypesZip: Supported types in zip: png, jpg, webp, avif, gif, mp4, webm, mp3, wav, glb, fbx, obj.

edit.title: Edit Post
edit.submitHeadingApproval: The post edit was submitted and will appear on the site if approved.
edit.locked: This post is locked. Cannot edit.

ban.title: Ban User
ban.header: Ban this user? You can also provide a reason.

bulkDelete.title: Bulk Delete
bulkDelete.header: Are you sure that you want to delete the selected posts?

captcha.title: Rate Limit Exceeded
captcha.header: Please verify that you are a human. You may ignore this, but content will be locked.

deleteAccount.header: Are you sure that you want to delete your account? This action is irreversible. You will permanently lose all of your favorites, comments, cuteness ratings, etc.
deleteAccount.header2: Because Moepictures is a site focused on community contributions, we will not remove any of your submitted posts. The account that uploaded these posts will show up as "deleted".
deleteAccount.header3: Are you sure that you want to continue?

deleteAllSaveSearch.title: Delete All Saved Searches
deleteAllSaveSearch.header: Are you sure you want to delete all saved searches?

deleteAllSearchHistory.title: Delete All Search History
deleteAllSearchHistory.header: Are you sure you want to delete all of your history?

deleteComment.title: Delete Comment
deleteComment.header: Do you want to delete this comment?

deleteFavgroup.title: Delete Favorite Group
deleteFavgroup.header: Are you sure you want to delete this favorite group?

deleteGroup.title: Delete Group
deleteGroup.banText: You are banned. Cannot submit a request.
deleteGroup.header: Do you want to delete this group?
deleteGroup.reasonHeader: Why do you want to delete this group?

deleteGroupHistory.title: Delete Group History
deleteGroupHistory.header: Are you sure that you want to delete this history state?
deleteGroupHistory.noDelete: The current history state cannot be deleted.

deleteMessage.title: Delete Message
deleteMessage.header: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this message?

deleteMessageReply.title: Delete Message Reply
deleteMessageReply.header: Do you want to delete this message reply?

deletePost.title: Delete Post
deletePost.header: Are you sure that you want to delete this post?
deletePost.reasonHeader: Why do you want to delete this post? (eg. low quality, AI-generated, or breaks other rule).

deleteReply.title: Delete Reply
deleteReply.header: Do you want to delete this reply?

deleteTag.title: Delete Tag
deleteTag.header: Do you want to delete this tag?
deleteTag.reasonHeader: If the tag is pointless/redundant, you may request it's deletion. Why do you want to delete this tag?

deleteThread.title: Delete Thread
deleteThread.header: Do you want to delete this thread?

deleteSearchHistory.title: Delete Search History
deleteSearchHistory.header: Do you want to delete this post from your history?

disable2FA.title: Disable 2FA
disable2FA.header: Are you sure you want to disable 2FA?

editTag.title: Edit Tag
editTag.submitText: Your tag edit request was submitted.
editTag.implicationEdits: This includes implication edits that were submitted for approval.

forwardMessage.title: Forward Message
forwardMessage.header: You may add or remove recipients.
forwardMessage.recipientLimit: You can't send to more than 5 recipients.

group.header: Enter the group name. A group will be created if it doesn't exist.
group.removeHeader: The post will be submitted for removal from the deleted groups.

lockPost.title: Lock Post
lockPost.header: Are you sure you want to lock this post?
lockPost.unlockHeader: Do you want to unlock this post?

privatePost.title: Private Post
privatePost.header: Do you want to set this post to private?
privatePost.unprivateHeader: Do you want to unprivate this post?

ocr.title: OCR Page
ocr.header: Run OCR on this page? (This will replace the current translations).

premium.title: Premium Required
premium.header: Premium is required to use this feature. Would you like to visit the premium page?
premium.headerTags: You need premium to search more than 3 tags. Would you like to visit the premium page?

r18.title: Warning: Explicit Content
r18.header: R18 Content is only suitable to be viewed by people over the age of 18. By continuing, you confirm that you are 18 years old or older and willing to view such content.

reportComment.title: Report Comment
reportComment.submitText: Comment report was sent. Thank you!
reportComment.header: Report comments that are spam, offensive, or otherwise breaking the rules.

reportReply.title: Report Reply
reportReply.submitText: Reply report was sent. Thank you!
reportReply.header: Report replies that are spam, offensive, or otherwise breaking the rules.

reportThread.title: Report Thread
reportThread.submitText: Thread report was sent. Thank you!
reportThread.header: Report threads that are spam, offensive, or otherwise breaking the rules.

revertAliasHistory.undoAliasHeading: Would you like to undo this aliasing?
revertAliasHistory.redoAliasHeading: Would you like to redo this aliasing?
revertAliasHistory.undoImplicationHeading: Would you like to undo this implication?
revertAliasHistory.redoImplicationHeading: Would you like to redo this implication?

revertGroupHistory.title: Revert Group History
revertGroupHistory.currentState: This is already the current history state.
revertGroupHistory.banText: You are banned. Cannot revert history.
revertGroupHistory.header: Are you sure that you want to revert back to this history state?

revertPostHistory.title: Revert Post History
revertPostHistory.locked: This post is locked. Cannot revert history.
revertPostHistory.imagePermission: Could not apply this state because you don't have permission to replace the image.

revertTagHistory.title: Revert Tag History
revertTagHistory.implicationPermission: You don't have permission to revert these implications.

saveTranslation.title: Save Translation
saveTranslation.header: Do you want to save the translation changes made to this post?
saveTranslation.banText: You are banned. Cannot save translations.
saveTranslation.locked: This post is locked. Cannot save translations

softDeleteMessage.title: Soft Delete Message
softDeleteMessage.header: Do you want to soft delete this message? (It will appear again if any other recipient replies).

takedownPost.title: Takedown Post
takedownPost.header: Are you sure that you want to takedown this post?
takedownPost.restoreHeader: Do you want to restore this post?

takedownTag.title: Takedown Tag
takedownTag.header: Are you sure that you want to takedown this tag and all related posts?
takedownTag.restoreHeader: Do you want to restore this tag and all related posts?

unban.header: Do you want to unban this user?
